ProductInfo.Features:
Brand New with Retail Packaging
Universally compatible to all bluetooth enabled devices such as mobile phones, iPhone, android phone, watch phone, phablet, PS3, PDA, and so on.
Ultra compact, small and light-weight, universally compatible headset that's extremely easy to use
The excellent handsfree bluetooth headset ideal for you to make and receive calls while on the move, in the car, or in the office conveniently
Package Content: 1 x Bluetooth Headset, 1 x A/C Charger (US Plug), 1 x Detachable Ear Hook, 1 x Instruction Manual
ProductInfo.Name: BT300BK Universal Mini Bluetooth Headset Wireless Handsfree For mobile phones, iPhone, android phone, watch phone, PS3, PDA
